name: Fallout: Marooned In Novac
description:
FALLOUT: Marooned In Novac

A freaky New Vegas sandbox fever dream to explore for a few minutes. You're stranded in a crater the size of Novac - many , many years after the legendary Courier Six wandered the Mojave Wasteland. Curiously, many of Novac's famed locations and haunts are to be found in the crater too. Thus, the name: Fallout: Marooned In Novac .

This game is a submission for RETRO JAM: 2021 . The original New Vegas was 3rd gen and I decided to retrofit it for PSX/PS1 in design and graphics. My implementation of the theme "Side Effects" is nonexistent but I really can't say what happened for this stranger to end up in such a creepy crater.

CONTROLS:

  • w,s,a,d / move
  • space bar / jump

BONUS ~Katamari Mode~

Revisit the map and become the void you're destined to be in a very loose spin of Katamari Damacy gameplay. Lonely, rolling void!

BONUS ~Novac Radio~ virtual music player

Listen to all of the songs from the game on demand from the comfort of the main menu. Including: Joel's eerie deconstruction of "Ain't That A Kick In The Head", a chilling cover of "Johnny Guitar", and many more!

TEAM:

Joel Wheeler: all music recording, mixing, and mastering, heaps of encouragement. Check out the soundtrack via bandcamp here.

Amye Sagar (obliviist): world design, graphics, general game development
